column4: Does anyone know why I suddently cannot burn any cd / dvd data discs?  I already had both k3b and Gnomebaker.. but neither one works
Can someone help me fix my cd/dvd drive please? :)
rebooted already ?
did any config changes since it doesn't work anymore ?
yep multiple times... I cannot recall.  The only thing I can think of is installing vmware
is vmware running ?
nope havent touched it since
maybe you should uninstall it, since i think it has background services
did you try booting from some other os/distro so you can make sure it isn't the fault of your drive ?
I know the drive is reading correctly but anytime I make a cd/dvd before it even starts I get an input/output error
wana paste that error ?
sure.... let me make up a dvd real quick
http://pastebin.ca/136355
I'm trying to backup OLD OLD stuff I had on cdr's
Incorrectly encoded string (3 Floppy (A).lnk) encountered.
thats the error
deal with it ?
see if you can turn joilet off
or rename the file that it mentions
okay
thanks you have no idea how stupid I feel :)
